TopicTitle: It's about time we had a new Gravity...

Articles.Content: Interesting little article on triple star system , 2 white dwarfs and pulsar.

And for your reading pleasure, I shall add a link to an article..

http://news.sciencemag.org/physics/2014/01/stellar-trio-could-put-einsteins-theory-gravity-test
